title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.48 - Projections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.48 - Projections

State Regulations
(a) ParksCorp may
order the removal, abatement or other modification of any projection on, over
or under any park, or on, over or under any area adjacent to any park, or any
sign on or over any street within a distance of 350 feet of any park in the
case that: (1)
no permit has been issued by

ParksCorp, the BPCA or other appropriate agency of the City of New York having
jurisdiction; or
(2)
such
projection or sign is inconsistent with the use and enjoyment of any park, with
regard to maintaining the beauty and utility of such park. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.48

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
